course.title: MAT 3375 Regression Analysis (3 units)
course.desc: Distribution theory, hypothesis testing and estimation for simple, multiple and non-linear regression. Generalized linear models, logistic and Poisson regression. Analysis of data using statistical software packages.Course Component: LecturePrerequisites: MAT 1341, MAT 2371, (MAT 2375 or MAT 2378 or MAT 2379).
